bio: I'm a passionate computer science student with a keen interest in full-stack development, cloud computing, and cybersecurity. My journey in tech started when I built my first website at the age of 15, and since then, I've been on a constant learning path, exploring new technologies and methodologies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

interests.fullStack: I enjoy creating end-to-end web applications, from designing intuitive user interfaces to building robust backend systems.
interests.cloudComputing: The scalability and flexibility of cloud platforms fascinate me, and I'm always exploring new ways to leverage cloud technologies in my projects.
interests.cybersecurity: In an increasingly connected world, I believe that understanding and implementing strong security measures is crucial for any tech professional.

goals: My goal is to become a proficient full-stack developer who can create secure, scalable, and user-friendly applications. I aspire to work on projects that have a positive impact on society and continue learning throughout my career.
